name: resume
description: A repo to track my resume
author: Evan Plaice

scripts.update: npm run update:build && npm run update:clean
scripts.update:build: hackmyresume BUILD Evan.Plaice-Full.Stack.Dev.json TO Evan.Plaice-Full.Stack.Dev.html Evan.Plaice-Full.Stack.Dev.pdf -t compact
scripts.update:clean: rm compact-html.css && rm compact-pdf.css && rm Evan.Plaice-Full.Stack.Dev.pdf.html
scripts.preview: npm run preview:build && npm run preview:clean
scripts.preview:build: hackmyresume BUILD Evan.Plaice-Full.Stack.Dev.json TO preview/resume.html preview/resume.pdf -t compact
scripts.preview:clean: rm preview/compact-html.css && rm preview/resume.pdf.html && rm preview/compact-pdf.css
